Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2008 03:05AM pregopanic wrote: Thank you so much everyone for your comforting words.  I know that no one can falsely reassure me and that is best.  I won't really know until we find out what my u/s reveals.  I am having a hard time with the waiting, but by the grace of God, I am trying to get thru it.  The U/S is on Monday, so keep me in your thoughts or prayers.  Thanks for being so sweet to me, everyone.  Hugs, Em
